Я беру маленькие пельмешки, отвариваю их, а потом на сковородку кидаю, жарю на масле до хрустящей корочки и кушаю с соусом для бургеров, очень вкусно

Half-Life 2 is or is one of the best games ever made. It is a first person shooter game that emphasizes physics and interactivity without taking control away from the player. And that's just describing the gameplay. One of the best things about the game is the story it tells. In this game you are Gordon Freeman a Black Mesa Scientist from the first game in the series. 

So, if you played the first you will love it even more! Even though this game was made in 2004 it still holds up to this day due to it's innovative gameplay and interesting story that will make science fiction fans and fps enjoyers satisfied. So, get this game if you like playing gaming history and an interesting story!
